action.action-desc: Mr. Graves of Missouri introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business
Additional sponsors: Mr. Hanna and Mr. Murphy of Florida
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act to raise the prime and subcontract goals, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Greater Opportunities for Small Business Act of 2014.

section.header: Small business prime and subcontract participation goals raised

subsection.text: Section 8(d)(6)(A) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 637(d)(6)(A)) is amended by inserting after percentage goals the following: of not less than 40 percent.
Section 15(g)(1)(A)(i) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 644(g)(1)(A)(i)) is amended by striking 23 percent and inserting 25 percent.

The amendment made by subsection (a) of this section shall take effect only beginning on the date on which the Administrator of the Small Business Administration has promulgated any regulations necessary, and the Federal Acquisition Regulation has been revised, to implement section 1614 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2014 and the amendments made by such section.

section.header: Repeal of certain provision pertaining to accounting of subcontractors
section.text: Section 15(g) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 644(g)) is amended by striking paragraph (3).
